divs: Sighting DetailsI go outside every night to see if they are their and sure enough they are their. to night i ask wife and my grandaughter to step outside show them where to. look ask both of them did they see them move both said yes. now what are the odds of them appearing about the same place every night?? i do not have a telescope are a video camara that i can video this event. but wish i did. Sincerly Jerry Taylor
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Moultrie
There were no other sightings in Moultrie on or around September 11th 2012
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
